articles.author: Ben Bocsak
articles.title: Liverpool can follow Fabio Carvalho summer transfer with £31m 'best U20 midfielder in Europe' - Liverpool.com
articles.description: Liverpool are likely to try and arrange a deal with Fabio Carvalho in the summer and once they have wrapped up the Fulham midfielder their next target should be obvious.
articles.content:
In the end, as the clock ticked on, Liverpool just didn't quite have enough time to complete a deal for Fabio Carvalho.
The Fulham attacker will now remain at Craven Cottage for the remainder of the… [+2801 chars]

articles.title: TCL 305 is the latest Android Go phone coming to Europe - PhoneArena
articles.description: TCL's new affordable smartphone, the 305 will be available in both Space Gray and Atlantic Blue and costs just €205 ($228), a good price for European customers.
articles.content: TCL isnt a smartphone company known for its high-end devices, but when it comes to affordability, few other handset manufacturers can compete with its prices in Europe and North America. However, ins… [+1344 chars]

articles.title: IEA Europe's Gas Demand Set To Decline In Favor Of Coal - OilPrice.com
articles.description: Europe's natural gas demand is set to decline this year as buyers begin to favor lower-priced coal, the International Energy Agency said in the latest edition of its quarterly gas market report
